title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message:
This board was water damaged without battery green light after 2 seconds become orange light and not turn. Found the following measurement
PPBUS_G3H @ C7900 : 12.56v=12.56v
PP3V42_G3H @ C4850 : 3.42v=3.42v
PPVRTC_G3H @ C1910 : 3.33v=3.3v
PP5V_S5 @ C7505 : 5.05V=5.1
PP5V_S4  5.1v
PP5V_S3 5.1v
PP3V3_S5 @ C8000 : 3.3v
PP3V3_S4  3.3
PP3V3_S3 3.3
SMC_RESET_L @ R5100 : 3.4v

PM_SLP_S4_L =0v???
PPVRTC =present.
 Any help appreciate. Thanks.

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message:
You've reported 3V3/5V_S3 both present; imposible without PM_SLP_S4_L high.
Please post accurate information.

Just in case, be sure U8010 is not shorted IN-OUT.

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message:
Sorry for wrong info , right one is 
PM_SLP_S4_L =3.3 v
U8010 is not shorted IN-OUT.

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message: What about PM_SLP_S3_L, any pulse at least?

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message:
Then you should get S0 voltages too.
I ddidn't see any mentioned above.
ALL_SYS_PWRGD pulses at least?

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message:
"Then you should get S0 voltages too.
I ddidn't see any mentioned above."
???

Do you get VCORE?
Post pin 3/U1950 voltage.

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message:
3/U1950=.32v not stable ( .48 to .32 V)
  Vcore yes, 1.7v.
S0 V yes.

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message:
Corrosion around U1950?
Post pins 5/6 voltage.

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message: pins 5/6 voltage=0 v and yes corrosion around U1950.

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message: Clean the area, rebuild traces, change U1950 and corroded resistors...

title: 820-4924-A Green / Orange light not turn on
message: change U1950 and check all registers , unit is back in normal. Solved. Thanks a lot.
